title: How to beat Yasuo as Riven
body: Hey guys, quick question here. How do you beat Yasuo as Riven ? Can you guys give me some advise please ...

replies.body:
* When you all in him try to do it in a place where he doesn't have minions to dash to.
* When you ult try to wind slash while he's stunned so that he doesn't block it with windwall.
* Respect his level 2 power spike.
* Abuse your level 6 power spike.

Good luck

During the Pick/Ban Phase of the match:

- Wait until your turn to ban
- When that times comes left click the search bar
-Type the word "Yasuo" into said search bar
-When his image appears, left click it.
- Move pointer to the word "ban".
- Left click
(If for some reason, you do not get the opportunity to ban,  try bribing your teammates with mystery gifts or threaten to janna jg until they ban yasuo for you.)
Congratulations, you have beaten Yasuo. Well Done.

Riven has great burst, so if you can land her CC's on Yasuo and burst with the advantage, you can win against a Yasuo. There are many great Riven players that stream their matchup advice, and [BoxBox](https://www.twitch.tv/flosd) in particular offers some good insight on the Riven vs Yasuo matchup. 

Let me know if that helps. :D
